content: Currently a constraint in a StructureDefinition requires an xpath. However, in a logical model, this doesn't make any sense (only the human-readable component is really that relevant). Any suggestions on how I should handle this? I thought perhaps condition might work, but no, that's a reference to another element's constraint.
Anyone help on this would be nice!
sorry, missed this. It's time to reverse the cardinality on expression and xpath.
for now, just put n/a or something as a work around
